file  SendHugeData.cpp
 Demonstration of sending between 2 services big buffers. The 2 services are using 2 connectors. One to send, one to receive. After n exchange, the data are check to see if they are corrupted and *local* data bit rate are computed.
file  SendHugeData.h
 Demonstration of sending between 2 services big buffers. The 2 services are using 2 connectors. One to send, one to receive. After n exchange, the data are check to see if they are corrupted and *local* data bit rate are computed.
